title: Match history and player statistics view
description: Build a view showing completed match history and basic player statistics. Players should be able to see their own match history (fixtures played, results) and basic statistics (matches played, win rate). This builds on the match result data entered via WI-034.
acceptance_criteria: Player can view their own match history on their profile page
History shows fixture date, opponent, venue, and result
Basic statistics displayed: matches played, wins, losses
Statistics broken down by matchup type (Men's, Women's, Mixed) if available
Season filter to view history by season
Empty state shown gracefully when no match history exists

approach: 1. Query fixture_players joined with matchups and fixtures for a given player
3. Build match history template with results list
4. Add statistics summary to player profile page
5. Link from profile to full history view

testing_requirements: Match history displays correct fixtures and results
Empty state handles gracefully for new players

context.user_story: As a player, I want to see my match history and statistics so I can track my playing record through the season
